text: Leland George Christensen (April 30, 1959 â€“ February 4, 2022) was an American politician. He was a Republican member of the Wyoming Senate from 2011 until 2019. Christensen was born in Alta, Wyoming. Christensen died on February 4, 2022 in Alta from problems caused by COVID-19 while receiving chemotherapy for non-Hodgkin's lymphoma, aged 62. ==References== Category:1959 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United States Category:State legislators of the United States Category:Politicians from Wyoming Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians
title: Leland Christensen
